mapper.select: SELECT f.feedNumber, f.feedContent, f.feedDate, u.userNumber, IF(feedNumber IN (SELECT feedNumber FROM Likes WHERE userNumber=#{userNumber}), 1, 0) AS checkLike, (SELECT COUNT(userNumber) FROM Likes WHERE Likes.feedNumber = f.feedNumber) AS cntLike, (SELECT COUNT(userNumber) FROM Comment WHERE Comment.feedNumber = f.feedNumber) AS cntComment FROM Feed AS f INNER JOIN User AS u USING(userNumber) WHERE feedNumber = #{feedNumber};
